question: In Kanazawa City, Japan, what is the name of the museum dedicated to contemporary art, which opened in 2004?
true_answer: 21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art, Kanazawa
asked_question_translated: Как се нарича музеят за съвременно изкуство в град Каназава, Япония, открит през 2004 г.?
answer: Музеят за съвременно изкуство в град Каназава, Япония, се нарича 21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art.
answer_translated_eng: The Museum of Contemporary Art in Kanazawa, Japan, is called the 21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art.
